thread.section_title: Hotel Baltimore Paris Champs-Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Poor customer service
thread.title_full: Poor customer service - Review of Hotel Baltimore Paris Champs-Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jenny M
title: Poor customer service
text: I have reserved for a week at this hotel for an upcoming stay. I have sent them 3 emails through their portal which is very laborious, regarding my reservation, and from which I have received aknowledgement receipt from the hotel but no one had the decency to answer any of my emails as of now ( more than 15 days later) I'm a member of the group as well. I will make sure not to use this chain in the future as their customer service is inexistant
